gantt
    title Kilo AI Deployment Timeline (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    dateFormat  mm
    axisFormat %M min

    section Hardware Setup
    Unbox Beelink SER7           :done, 00, 5m
    Install Ubuntu 22.04          :done, 05, 15m

    section Software Install
    Install Docker                :active, 22, 5m

    Build Docker images           :29, 10m

    section AI Models
    Download Llama 3.1 8B         :39, 8m

    section Configuration
    Start all services            :47, 2m
    Configure tablet              :49, 5m
    Add first medication          :54, 3m
    Test chat interaction         :57, 2m

    section Complete
    System ready                  :milestone, 59, 0m
